attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LCC8R8enCYcAsYay75O_description
attribs.current:
[[4d6d1]][[4d6d1]][[4d6d1]][[4d6d1]][[4d6d1]][[4d6d1]]

These numbers may be arranged in any order.
If you dont like these stats you may do 27-point buy with this calculator: http://1-dot-encounter-planner.appspot.com/point-buy-calculator.html

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LCC8zXWnXUzinvvkxqo_description
attribs.current:
Make a token on http://rolladvantage.com/tokenstamp/ upload the token as your character image, and change the character name with this format:

PC Name (Game ID)

This is so the character can be assigned to you and a token can be made even while you are offline. if you fail to follow these instructions the character will eventually get deleted.

attribs.name: npc_resistances
attribs.current: Cold; Bludgeoning, Piercing, And Slashing From Nonmagical/nonsilver Weapons

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LCKxaB5vwGc-XnhQgDJ_desc
attribs.current: The imp can use its action to polymorph into a beast form that resembles a rat (speed 20 ft.), a raven (20 ft., fly 60 ft.), or a spider (20 ft., climb 20 ft.), or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form, except for the speed changes noted. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LCKxaB5vwGc-XnhQgDK_desc
attribs.current: Magical darkness doesn't impede the imp's darkvision.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LCKxaB5vwGc-XnhQgDL_desc
attribs.current: The imp has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LCKxaB5vwGc-XnhQgDM_desc
attribs.current: The imp can enter into a contract to serve another creature as a familiar, forming a Telepathic Bond with its willing master. While the two are bonded, the master can sense what the imp senses as long as they are within 1 mile of each other. While the imp is within 10 feet of its master, the master shares the impâ€™s Magic Resistance trait. If its master violates the terms of the contract, the imp can end its service as a familiar, ending the Telepathic Bond.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LCKxaB5vwGc-XnhQgDN_description
attribs.current: and the target must make on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LCKxaB6nuLIUv5iyKbk_description
attribs.current: The imp magically turns invisible until it attacks, or until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the imp wears or carries is invisible with it.
